solution_line_template: From the details given, the car has traveled {after_1st_turn} meters at the 1st turn + {after_2nd_turn} meters after the 2nd turn + {after_4th_turn} meters after the 4th turn = <<{after_1st_turn}+{after_2nd_turn}+{after_4th_turn}={sum_known_distances}>>{sum_known_distances} meters around the ring.
It must therefore have driven {total_distance} total meters – {sum_known_distances} calculated meters = {after_3rd_turn} meters after the 3rd turn.
